abstract_summ: A modification arguing that the human movement energy may change with time is made on our previous infectious disease model, in which infectious disease transmission is considered as a sequential chemical reaction and reaction rate constants obey the Eyrings rate process theory and free volume concept.The parameters readily yield the peak infection rate and means for flattening the curve.The Eyrings rate process theory and free volume concept, two very popular theories in chemistry and physics fields, are employed to treat infectious disease transmissions.The SIR model, statistical approach to the parameter identification and the official WHO daily data about the confirmed cumulative number of cases were used to calculate the SIR curves and make some estimations and predictions.The modified model is employed to fit current covid-19 outbreak data in USA and to make predictions on the numbers of the infected, the removed and the death in the foreseeable future.
title_summ: A Mechanistic Model to Rate Strategies for Disease ManagementPrediction of Coronavirus Disease (covid-19) Evolution in USA with the Model Based on the Eyring Rate Process Theory and Free Volume ConceptSignature of State measures on the COVID-19 Pandemic in China, Italy, and USAComparison of the coronavirus pandemic dynamics in Europe, USA and South KoreaInfection Dynamics of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (Covid-19) Modeled with the Integration of the Eyring Rate Process Theory and Free Volume ConceptDiffusion as a First Model of Spread of Viral InfectionStabilization of the coronavirus pandemic in Italy and global prospectsOn the Spread of Coronavirus Infection.
title_abstract_phrases: Prediction of Coronavirus Disease (covid-19) Evolution in USA with the Model Based on the Eyring Rate Process Theory and Free Volume ConceptA modification arguing that the human movement energy may change with time is made on our previous infectious disease model, in which infectious disease transmission is considered as a sequential chemical reaction and reaction rate constants obey the Eyrings rate process theory and free volume concept.Infection Dynamics of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (Covid-19) Modeled with the Integration of the Eyring Rate Process Theory and Free Volume ConceptThe Eyrings rate process theory and free volume concept, two very popular theories in chemistry and physics fields, are employed to treat infectious disease transmissions.A Mechanistic Model to Rate Strategies for Disease ManagementEffective policy making based on ongoing COVID-19 pandemic is an urgent issue.The parameters readily yield the peak infection rate and means for flattening the curve.The virus particle transmission rate is assumed to obey the Eyring rate process theory and also controlled by how much free volume available in a system.
